title: Helen Hunt rushed to hospital after car flips during violent vehicle collision
text:
Helen Hunt was rushed to hospital after the car she was traveling in flipped (Picture: WireImage)

Helen Hunt was rushed to hospital after the car she was traveling in flipped amid a violent collision with another vehicle.

Footage of the incident shows that Helen’s vehicle, of which she was travelling in the back seat, assumed it had a clear path to cross the intersection but was clipped at the last moment by a second white car, forcing the SUV to flip on its side.

The Twister and As Good as It Gets actress was taken to Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Beverly Hills after complaining of pain but reps for the 56-year-old have since confirmed she was ‘shaken, but suffered no major injuries’.

TMZ reports that local police forces have not cited anyone ‘for the crash, and drugs and alcohol are not suspected in the incident’.

Helen found fame in the 1990s in the sitcom Mad About You (Picture: Getty Images)

Helen found fame in the 1990s in the sitcom Mad About You for which she won won three Golden Globe Awards for Best Actress and four Emmy Awards for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series.

Advertisement

Advertisement

She went on to win the best actress Oscar for the romantic comedy As Good as It Gets while she also appeared in Cast Away and What Women Want.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Most recently she has appeared in BBC series World On Fire, which follows civilians who become caught up in the war and one way or another must struggle to survive.

description: Helen Hunt was taken to hospital after the car crash.
